hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="RDEVCLIENTX" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog3.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ############ /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh metalib/tests/phase2.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-dev.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog/bin/deb-make.sh'
